data.text: Mma wʼani mmerɛ amumuyɛfoɔ,
Ɛfiri sɛ, wɔn akoma dwene atirimuɔdensɛm ho,
Wɔde nyansa na ɛsi efie,
ɛnam nimdeɛ so na wɔnya ademudeɛ a ɛho yɛ na
Onyansafoɔ wɔ tumi a ɛso,
deɛ ɔretu sa hia akwankyerɛ,
Nyansa wɔ akyiri dodo ma ɔkwasea;
Onipa ɔbɔ pɔ bɔne no
Ogyimifoɔ nhyehyɛeɛ yɛ bɔne,
Sɛ wʼabamu go wɔ ɔhaw mu a,
Gye wɔn a wɔde wɔn rekɔ akɔkum wɔn no nkwa;
Sɛ woka sɛ, “Na yɛnnim yei ho hwee a,”
Me ba, di ɛwoɔ, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ;
Hunu nso sɛ nyansa yɛ wo kra dɛ;
Nkɔtɛ ɔteneneeni fie sɛ ɔkwanmukafoɔ,
Ɛwom sɛ ɔteneneeni hwe ase mpɛn nson deɛ, nanso ɔsɔre bio,
Sɛ wo ɔtamfoɔ hwe ase a mma ɛnyɛ wo dɛ;
ɛfiri sɛ Awurade bɛhunu wʼadwene na ɔrempɛ
Ɛnha wo ho wɔ abɔnefoɔ enti
ɛfiri sɛ, ɔbɔnefoɔ nni anidasoɔ biara daakye,
Me ba, suro Awurade ne ɔhene,
ɛfiri sɛ saa baanu yi de ɔsɛeɛ bɛba wɔn so mpofirim,
Yeinom nso yɛ anyansafoɔ Nsɛnka:
Obiara a ɔbɛka akyerɛ deɛ ɔdi fɔ sɛ, “Wo ho nni asɛm” no
Na wɔn a wɔbu afɔdifoɔ fɔ no ɛbɛsi wɔn yie,
Mmuaeɛ pa
Wie wo mfikyidwuma
Nni adanseɛ ntia ɔyɔnko a ɔnyɛɛ wo hwee,
Nka sɛ, “Deɛ wayɛ me no me nso mɛyɛ no bi;
Menante faa onihafoɔ afuo ho
nkasɛɛ afu wɔ baabiara,
Mede mʼadwene kɔɔ deɛ mehunuiɛ no so
nna kakra, nkotɔ kakra,
bɛma ohia aba wo so sɛ ɔkwanmukafoɔ
